item.title: Business Case
item.description:
I mainly deal with business cases in internet and e-commerce operations, fresh agricultural product supply chain, agriculture, catering, etc.

Cloud Computing and Programmer Blog

Time: 2022 - Present

Location: China, Ukraine, Germany

Company: MegaEase Cloud, CoolShell

Project Overview:

Collaborated with Chen Hao to prepare the European cloud computing company MegaEase Cloud, exploring overseas market agency business. Submitted a business plan to an investment incubator and passed the review. During the process of applying for a business Schengen visa, the original plan was temporarily shelved due to the sudden and unexpected death of partner and founder Chen Hao…
